author: Filmento
description:
Learn coding in a fun way that feels like a game with Boot.dev, 25% off with code FILMENTO: https://boot.dev/?promo=FILMENTO

The Fantastic Four: First Steps expands the MCU in a goofy retro 60s timeline. But despite the surface, the movie is very deep and powerful with its emotion, much like Captain America: Civil War. It grabs your focus and doesn't let it back. So today, let's see how that's done.

title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps – How to Harness Civil War | Film Perfection
